Description: Part of the blade of a bifacial knife: of mottled brown flint, carefully pressure flaked and sharpened. Broken off at each end.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Anedjib, Tomb X1 subsidiary grave
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XV, 2nd from bottom of group marked X.
